channel.title: What programs do i need to make server?
channel.description: Hi, i am in desperate need of a program to make a server.... :confused:

item.title: What programs do i need to make server?
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

[quote=“Foxxxx, post:2, topic:95285”]To make? You will need Java JDK 5.0 or 6.0 ,…Mod Taharoks Perfect Compiler, knowing how to code - Ctrl + F , Ctrl + H, such as that. To host,… You would need to go to www.no-ip.com or www.hamachi.cc/download then use the compiler, Type in C then enter, then if their is no errors, you can update it, then after that is done, R then enter, and your server is running. Do not exit out of the .batch file or your server will crash. Then no-ip requires just getting it up, hamachi requires networks, passwords and your computers IP : located at the top of the screen of the hamachi menu. Then , after that, you are ready too edit and make your own server,…check out the tutorials in the Tutorials section of this fourm for some codes.

PS : I went out of hand and typed alot, sorry! :o[/quote]

Too bad you forgot a source. =p

Read full topic
item.source: What programs do i need to make server?

item.title: What programs do i need to make server?
item.dc:creator: @Foxxxx Foxxxx
item.description:
@Foxxxx wrote:

To make?You will need to download a server source in the Downloads section, Testscape is very good for,…well, testing. You will need Java JDK 5.0 or 6.0 ,…Mod Taharoks Perfect Compiler, knowing how to code - Ctrl + F , Ctrl + H, such as that. To host,… You would need to go to www.no-ip.com or www.hamachi.cc/download then use the compiler, Type in C then enter, then if their is no errors, you can update it, then after that is done, R then enter, and your server is running. Do not exit out of the .batch file or your server will crash. Then no-ip requires just getting it up, hamachi requires networks, passwords and your computers IP : located at the top of the screen of the hamachi menu. Then , after that, you are ready too edit and make your own server,…check out the tutorials in the Tutorials section of this fourm for some codes.

PS : I went out of hand and typed alot, sorry! :o NOTE : Happy VoragC?

Read full topic
